attributes.action: call a genral election because we no longer trust the MP's after the expence scandle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a country as a whole we demand a genral election. due to recent expence scandles and the fact gordon brown was not elected to goven the country. and the fact most of the people DO NOT TRUST THE CURRENT MPs AND WANT THEM OUT
gordon it's time to go

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
